Super comfy

I love the length of this top which covers my bottom.  I have two of these and they wash up well. I have gotten several compliments on them.  Amazon recommended XXL as the size I needed (5’7” 170#) but it is too large.  My second one I ordered an XL and it was a much better fit. Good quality, well made!

Runs small, fabric unflattering, the quality is okay. But if you have any amount of stomach the fabric will cling to it. I usually wear a medium but I sized up to a large but it still just didn't seem to fit right.
So I really liked this. It has unbanded bottom so it doesn't cut anywhere or waist or hips. More of a free-flowing lightweight has a hood. Nice strings washes up well highly recommend

I ordered this because it was longer in length to cover the behind over leggings. My only complaint is there are no pockets. I love pockets. But overall this is a great pullover to wear walking in the morning.  Wash as well, I do not put it in the dryer.

This is a super cute shirt and I like the color, although the red is darker than I expected.  I received the blue one for Christmas and this one does not fit the same.  It is smaller and tighter across the chest/armpit area.  Not the fault of the shirt - just disappointing the inconsistent sizing.  This one may go back, but the blue one fits just right.
